ProjectTitle: Art perception and appreciation in galleries and museums: Multi-method studies with a focus on mobile eye-tracking and questionnaires
InitialFeedbackHistory:
12/06/2023
Data: Please use the data table provided in the DMP template for your future DMPs. 
Ethics: Please submit an updated DMP as intermediate when you have ethical and privacy approval where you include the reference number, update other sections if needed. 
Storage/preservation: Storing data on computers and hard drives is not very secure, and onedrive is not suitable for long term storage since this is linked to your account and expires when you leave KU Leuven; use the storage guide to select more secure alternatives: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en
label: good with suggestions
